channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Overflowing bins not been emptied, 26th August
item.description:
These bins have still been emptied despite being told they would be done, last Monday, “in the next couple of days” The issue is not resolved

item.title: Multiple George Cross flags around Nugent Centre, 26th August
item.description:
This is part of operation raise the flag which is a campaign of intimidation being rolled out across the country. It is based on racist anti-immigration ideology and should be treated as a hate crime and dealt with urgently. Orpington is traditionally a place of safety and refuge and should be maintained as such.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Market Meadow, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wellington Road, Widmore, London

item.title: Flytipping of business waste, 26th August
item.description:

item.title: Graffiti, 26th August
item.description:
This graffiti is on the side of our building at 23/25 Dalston Lane, E8 3DF and on our fire exit door. It is at ground floor level and first floor level. The side of the building is in Hartwell Street, E8. There is also more graffiti on our shutter.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dalston Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sofa at top of stairs, 26th August
item.description:
Hi, I previously have reported this issue twice and it was incorrectly marked as fixed as it is still there. Can someone please remove the sofa that has been left at the top of the stairs in the block? It’s potentially a fire escape hazard.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kent Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Drain blocked,.street floods with every rain, 26th August
item.description:
The drain in front of the train station is completely blocked. It's been causing floods with every.rwinfall FOR YEARS. Please fix it finally. This is a busy street in the middle of the neighbourhood and a train station.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Castle Square, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Forest Bike Outside Office, 26th August
item.description:
Inconsiderate Forest Bike user again has left bike abandoned outside our office restricting access and blocking pavement. Its unfair that a 70 year old should be dependant on others to move the bike to gain access to his office.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Seven Sisters Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped Car., 26th August
item.description:
This car has been dumped here for months i have contacted the car company who has left a sticker on window and they were no help at all. Its very tight for parking on this road so this would be great if it were to be removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 59, Shirley Road, Longlands, Sidcup, London
